l:dependency.name: Plugin Utilities API Plugin
l:dependency.l:description: Provides several utility classes that can be used to accelerate plugin development.

l:dependency.name: error-prone annotations
l:dependency.l:description: Sonatype helps open source projects to set up Maven repositories on https://oss.sonatype.org/

l:dependency.name: Java coding style
l:dependency.l:description: Provides all necessary resources for a Java project to enforce the coding style that I am using in my lectures about software development at Munich University of Applied Sciences and in all of my open source projects. It configures several static analysis tools for Maven and IntelliJ. Moreover, it provides some sample classes that already use this style guide. This classes can be used as such but are not required in this project. These classes also use some additional libraries that are included using the Maven dependency mechanism. If the sample classes are deleted then the dependencies can be safely deleted, too.

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Lang
l:dependency.l:description: Apache Commons Lang, a package of Java utility classes for the classes that are in java.lang's hierarchy, or are considered to be so standard as to justify existence in java.lang.
